Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.8 String Functions and Operators
Description: Repeat a string the specified number of times

Returns a string consisting of the string
          str repeated
          count times. If
          count is less than 1, returns an
          empty string. Returns NULL if
          str or
          count is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT REPEAT('MySQL', 3);
        -> 'MySQLMySQLMySQL'
